00001 <?php
00002 /* SVN FILE: $Id: authorizenet.php 181 2009-02-08 15:23:14Z david@ramaboo.com $ */
00003 /**
00004  * @brief Authorize.Net config file.
00005  * 
00006  * Contains default values for Authorize.Net constants. You will need to override all of these if you use Authorize.Net.
00007  * 
00008  * @file
00009  * @license     http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt GNU General Public License
00010  * @link        http://code.ramaboo.com/ Boo Framework
00011  * @copyright   2008 David Singer
00012  * @author      David Singer <david@ramaboo.com>
00013  * @version     2.0.1
00014  * @see         Boo_AuthorizeNet
00015  */
00016 
00017 /**
00018  * @brief Authorize.Net API Login ID.
00019  * 
00020  * \b Important the API Login ID is a sensitive piece of account information and should only be shared on a need-to-know basis.
00021  * 
00022  * @see http://www.authorize.net/support/Merchant/Integration_Settings/Access_Settings.htm
00023  */
00024 if (!defined('BOO_AUTHORIZE_NET_LOGIN_ID')) { define('BOO_AUTHORIZE_NET_LOGIN_ID', 'YOUR_LOGIN_ID'); }
00025 
00026 /**
00027  * @brief Authorize.Net Transaction Key.
00028  * 
00029  * \b Important the Transaction Key is a sensitive piece of account information that should only be shared on a need-to-know basis.
00030  * 
00031  * @see http://www.authorize.net/support/Merchant/Integration_Settings/Access_Settings.htm
00032  */
00033 if (!defined('BOO_AUTHORIZE_NET_TRAN_KEY')) { define('BOO_AUTHORIZE_NET_TRAN_KEY', 'YOUR_TRAN_KEY'); }
00034 
00035 /**
00036  * @brief Defines the default mode for Authorize.Net.
00037  * 
00038  * Set to 'live' to proccess transactions.
00039  * Using 'certification' will often yeild better results than 'test'.
00040  * 
00041  * @warning If you recieve error 13 try Boo_AuthorizeNet::testRequest() in live mode.
00042  * 
00043  * @see Boo_AuthorizeNet::setMode();
00044  */
00045 if (!defined('BOO_AUTHORIZE_NET_DEFAULT_MODE')) { define('BOO_AUTHORIZE_NET_DEFAULT_MODE', 'certification'); }
00046 
00047 /**
00048  * @brief Authorize.Net MD5 hash.
00049  * Set in your merchant interface (Account -> Settings -> MD5-Hash).
00050  * Unless you using Boo_AuthorizeNet::checkMd5() then you can safely leave this blank.
00051  */
00052 if (!defined('BOO_AUTHORIZE_NET_MD5')) { define('BOO_AUTHORIZE_NET_MD5', ''); }
